pl.polsl.lab.worldcupstats.models

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab.worldcupstats.models.Group
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Group
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing a group. Object of Group type stores ArrayList of Teams and ArrayList of its matches Implements Serializable interface to manage streaming WCSModel object through activities
    See Also:
    Serializable, Serialized Form

      void addNewTeam(java.lang.String teamName)
      Adds new Team to Vector of teams.
      void calculateTeamsPoints()
      Calculate teams points depending on results. 3 pts if win, 1 if draw, 0 if lose

      Returns amout of teams in this group

      Returns group name

      Returns an array of string of teams assigned to this group

      Check if group is confrimed (results are confirmed)
      boolean isFull()
      Returns true if group has 4 teams (is infilled, full).

      Sets true if results are confirmed
      void setMatches()
      Sets right configuration of matches between Teams (from teamsArrayList) Adds new Match obj to matchArrayList

      Sets result of particular match from matchesArrayList.
      void setName(char name)
      Sets group name
      void sortTeams()
      Sorting teams in teamsArrayList by their points using bubble sort algorithm

        public void setMatchResult(int whichMatch,
                           int firstTeamScore,
                           int secondTeamScore)
        Sets result of particular match from matchesArrayList.
        Parameters:
        whichMatch - index of match from matchesArrayList to set result to
        firstTeamScore - score of first team
        secondTeamScore - score of second team
